en.title: Inauguration Experience
en.intro: On January 20th, 2017, Donald Trump will be sworn in as the 45th president of the United States of America. Large number of attendees will witness this peaceful transition of power. Those who can't attend in person can follow VOA's Inauguration Experience map.
en.shout: Put yourself in the crowd! Tweet #2trump with your hopes for President Trump's first term. Your message will display below.
